channel.title: Creating a random website
channel.description:
Alright guys, I got a free website from X10hosting.com and it has unlimited storage so I'm going to have some fun. I'm adding two versions of the website, one in HTML5 and one in standard HTML4.1 The problem is, I really don't know what to add on to this site. The HTML 5 is restricted for my use only, but HTML 4.1, not so much. I can host RSPS webclients, media, downloads etc. If I really like your stuff. It might be moved into the HTML5 section.
First of all the title is My site of Hell. I didn't know what to pick so I picked that. It really doesn't matter but it's now official.
Second, I am coding the website completely free hand. No online programs used etc. I'm using free software called Notepad++. I feel it gets the job done, there isn't to much clutter, and it is nice and neat. Third, on the index page, I need some sort of background image. I would like it rather big, and it can be anything (age appropriate, nothing immature.) I can position it anywhere on the screen that I feel is suitable for it.
Anyone got idea's for the image or what they think should be added to the site I'm not adding forums because I'm to lazy to work with MySQL.

item.title: Creating a random website
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

RSPS web clients will get your site permanently suspended if using x10.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a random website
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lemme_winks_:

all u have to do is create a database and the forum engine will do the rest for u. what is so hard about that?

I’m lazy…

Oh and this account originally was lost I couldn’t recover pass because my email was hi-jacked, I just got my email back 3 days ago.
had 4200 emails bro.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a random website
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:7, topic:425095”]isnt my problem

i give them their Html/css/php stuff

and most of them time i check if they are copyright free, and if they say just to let 1 little text say this is made by … anywhere small in the page, i just do that no1 notice it cuz i cover it up with the same background color :)[/quote]
If it’s invisible you can still get in trouble

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:5, topic:425095”]lol download templates, rip the background.

thats how i make my money for going out :)))

friends of friends of friends give my name to ea other

and they need website, i download templates edit them in dreamweaver and done

free 300$ in 1/2 hours[/quote]
Stealing copyrighted work… Hmm Lets?

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a random website
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Lol, yeah.

Usually if you’re stuck for ideas just create a website about one of your hobbies/interests. Something that’s going to keep you interested.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating a random website
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

The Outsider:

For an idea on the image you need an idea on what type of website it’s going to be. No good having a background of Pokemon on a RuneScape help site, for instance.

It going to be a website of well, bits of everything. I am not the creative type, however I am great at making websites. They don’t go together well which is my problem.

Read full topic
